title: Uncontrollable
description: Slade thought that life would start to settle down now that Samantha had agreed to be his wife. He had landed the girl of his dreams. What could possibly go wrong?  One by one, things start to happen, and he does everything he can to protect his Angel.  There was nothing he wouldn't do for her.  But he could never have imagined that their lives were going to get so...Uncontrollable   Loyalty will be tested  Love will be tainted  Boundaries will be crossed  Hearts will be shattered  Lies will be told  Secrets will be revealed  Slade and Samanthaâ€™s story comes to an end. Will their love get them through what they never saw coming?
author: Shantel Tessier
